lead_paragraph: PECK--Norman L. The former Directors, Officers, and Staff of The Peter Jay Sharp Foundation mourn the passing of our President, CEO, and Director Norman L. Peck. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his wife Liliane and his children Dominique and Ian and their families. He will be missed. Dan Lufkin Edmund Duffy Barry Tobias 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PECK, NORMAN L

snippet: PECK--Norman L. The former Directors, Officers, and Staff of The Peter Jay Sharp Foundation mourn the passing of our President, CEO, and Director Norman L. Peck. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his wife Liliane and his children Dominique and Ian and their families. He will be missed. Dan Lufkin Edmund Duffy Barry Tobias 1/3
